data.title: The Palm Restaurant
data.meta_description: The Palm Restaurant has moved to Downtown Houston! Featuring prime aged steak and seafood dishes. Join us for lunch or dinner! Menu | Reservations

Additional Information

The Palm Houston, located near the Toyota Center and Minute Maid Park, is the perfect dining destination for any occasion. Guests are welcome to enjoy premier cuisine, service, and ambiance in the heart of Downtown Houston.

Whatever Your Mood

Whether youâ€™re looking for a relaxing cocktail at our beautiful bar, craving a generous steak with the perfect glass of wine, or planning a special party for an upcoming milestone, we have all this and more waiting for you at The Palm.

Learn Our Story

Catering

Planning your next event has never been so easy, or delicious! The Palm now offers online ordering for all of your event catering needs! Placing an order is just a few clicks away. Build your order, checkout and let us take care of the rest!
